errors.title: Greed Over Generosity
errors.the_error: We chose greed over generosity. We took instead of gave. We accumulated instead of shared.
errors.the_correction: Choose generosity. Give, don't take. Share, don't accumulate. The Table serves all.

errors.title: Pride Over Humility
errors.the_error: We chose pride over humility. We exalted ourselves instead of serving. We ruled instead of helped.
errors.the_correction: Choose humility. Serve, don't exalt. Help, don't rule. The Table is greater than any individual.

errors.title: Hate Over Love
errors.the_error: We chose hate over love. We hated instead of loved. We destroyed instead of built.
errors.the_correction: Choose love. Love, don't hate. Build, don't destroy. Love is the highest mastery.

errors.title: Deception Over Honesty
errors.the_error: We chose deception over honesty. We lied instead of told truth. We deceived instead of revealed.
errors.the_correction: Choose honesty. Truth, don't lie. Reveal, don't deceive. The table never lies.

errors.title: Indifference Over Compassion
errors.the_error: We chose indifference over compassion. We ignored instead of helped. We turned away instead of reached out.
errors.the_correction: Choose compassion. Help, don't ignore. Reach out, don't turn away. We are all one.
